New Records: In their 23 T20I encounters, India has won 12 matches compared to England's 11 wins.
Pre-Game Insights: India and England have faced each other 23 times in T20 internationals, with India having a marginally better record.
Team India has faced off against England in the World Cup 13 times since 1975, winning 6 matches.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is scheduled to start at 8 PM IST on June 27, 2024, at the Providence Stadium in Guyana.
Fans can watch the match live on Star Sports Network and Disney+ Hotstar app in India.
